DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to confirm the safety, efficacy and delineate the pharmacokinetic properties of nelfinavir in HIV/ Hepatitis C coinfected subjects with Child Pugh A compensated cirrhosis and or Hepatic fibrosis
DOC.brief_title: An Open Label Study To Evaluate The Safety and Kinetics of Nelfinavir in Subjects With HIV and Hepatitis C
DOC.criteria: HIV/ Hepatitic C co infected with documented HCV viremia evidence for cirrhosis and or hepatic fibrosis on liver biopsy, positive fibrosis index, stable health Decompensated cirrhosis (Child Pugh B or C) Pregnant or lactating women History of previous antiretrovirals > 14 days
